content: **october 2017 - there is now a video showing increases ** how to increase 1 free pattern for a newborn wrap sweater formerly called kimono but i am being conscientious about cultural appropriation main colour needs about 150-175 yards contrast colour needs a small amount if you want to make it larger you can chain more stitches in the beginning or go up a hook size currently pattern is newborn or 0-3 month 1 https //youtu be/c9kmcf6hbvy
